title: Mobile-Based Literacy Enhancement Program for Adult Professionals

context.prior_knowledge: Learners with basic decoding skills but lacking functional literacy
context.additional_context: Social domain literacy education program for professionals in medical/legal/technical fields to improve workplace document comprehension and communication skills

learning_goals: Learners can extract key information from work-related texts (medical records/legal documents/technical manuals) with 80% accuracy
Learners can complete 15-minute literacy practice assignments three times weekly via mobile applications
Learners achieve over 70% reading comprehension in peer feedback-based formative assessments to incrementally improve literacy levels

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
